name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>捜<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>査<rt>さ</rt></ruby><ruby>官<rt>かん</rt></ruby>ミスマッチ

requirement.en: If your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field, send 1 Level 3 or lower Reptile Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 7 Reptile Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Attack Position.
